about_the_game:
Switched Destiny is a 2D puzzle, 1-bit pixel art, retrogame.

The player controls an astronaut who seeks to uncover a space mystery that has befallen the ship, collecting items, and keys to pass the level. The full game will have 5 levels with 10 levels each. The game is easy to play, the graphic and sound setting creates a tense atmosphere and engages the player.

Immerse yourself in the 1-bit retro world of "Switched Destiny." Step into the shoes of an astronaut trapped in an invaded ship. Guided by the ship's AI, unlock doors, gather crucial items, and unveil the mystery to secure your salvation. The minimalist pixel art style, using only black and white, heightens the ship's enigmatic atmosphere. Can you uncover the ship's secrets and find your path to freedom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
